HTMLUListElement.summary: The HTMLUListElement interface provides special properties (beyond those defined on the regular interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating unordered list ({{HTMLElement("ul")}}) elements.

remarks.para: -The HTML element implementing this interface: ul.

HTMLUListElementCompact.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The compact property of the interface indicates that spacing between list items should be reduced. The exact handling of the compact attribute is browser-specific. Instead of using this property, consider using CSS line-height instead.

remarks.para: It reflects the compact attribute of the ul element.
